pullRequest.title: Added property to allow the user to specify the max number of objects and details in search:
pullRequest.bodyText: Some clients of ours had this problem, they had a lot of files to search inside, but NetBeans limited the maximum number of results to 500.

commit.message: Added property to allow the user to specify the max number of objects and details in search:

nodes.bodyText:
This shall be documented in arch.xml as an <api group="systemproperty" ...>some description</api>. See howto for more details about arch.xml.
Also one shall version the change. E.g. increase the module version and leave a note in apichanges.xml file.
